title: Rank #3 Challenger Team LF ADC
body:
**Integral (formerly known as AnVaro) is currently seeking a Diamond+ AD carry.**

**Requirements:**
1. Over 17 Years old
2. Working Microphone
3. Consistently stable internet
4. Mechanically skilled with substantial game knowledge.
5. Good Mentality
6. Free at least 4-5 nights a week (roughly 3-4 hours each night)
7. MUST be Diamond+ (No d5 0lp)

Feel free to message either myself or iNT Matrix PLT in-game to organize trial times.

Thanks.

replies.body: Finally stopped using your scripting ad? hahahaha

We've been using a sub recently. And he isn't a scripter.

But in response to us stopping using him, yes.
